HomePage.title: Focus on <execution>execution.</execution>
HomePage.description:
The smart task partner for professionals.

Eliminate the gap between planning and execution to maximize your performance.

A new task management tool that visualizes the flow of time.

visualized.title: Visualized Timeline
visualized.description:
Capture time "visually".

Real-time visualization of the remaining time of the day and total task volume. Eliminate vague anxiety and provide clear visibility.

execution.title: Seamless Execution
execution.description:
Uninterrupted thinking, smooth execution.

Start and end tasks with just one action: the play button. Eliminating complex operations to not hinder your immersion into the flow state.

logging.title: Reliable Logging
logging.description:
Results refine the next plan.

Automatically log planned vs. actual management. A feedback loop based on data, not intuition, sharpens your sense of time.

section_planning.title: Section Planning
section_planning.description: Divide and manage your day by time zones (sections). Plan reasonably according to the context.

one_click_timer.title: One-Click Timer
one_click_timer.description: Intuitive stopwatch function. Clarify the task currently being executed.

hierarchical_planning.title: Hierarchical Planning
hierarchical_planning.description: Set goals for yearly, monthly, and weekly periods. Realize unhesitating execution with task design based on higher-level goals.
